description:
! 𝐓𝐨 𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐞𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝐛𝐚𝐝𝐠𝐞: !
𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐯𝐞 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐓𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐧𝐚𝐦𝐞 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐦𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐛𝐨𝐱 𝐚𝐟𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐡𝐢𝐭 𝐩𝐚𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐜𝐢𝐩𝐚𝐭𝐞;
𝐑𝐞𝐭𝐰𝐞𝐞𝐭 𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝐓𝐰𝐞𝐞𝐭: https://twitter.com/AYAnatureNews/status/1515320938472083460

**AYA Easter Egg Collection:** https://soonaverse.com/collection/0xd68bf98e6429c8fef287c676884e46ee36f6f9a0 

ℬℯ𝒶𝓊𝓉𝒾𝒻𝓊𝓁 ℬ𝒶𝒹ℊℯ𝓇𝓈!
Easter Eggs, the child in us loves ‘m. The gamers love ‘m! The excitement of finding something precious. Like the old days.. Use our instinct and feel the adrenaline, being in the moment, fomo and fun! Ooo and then that 1 special egg, with the shiny colors or maybe you just want the Golden Easter egg?! Feeling the excitement yet?! Well, we made it all possible for you to experience again! Join the hunt and find your favorite Easter Eggs! 


The AYA Nature Bunny (our designer 3Demian) has been busy! He created 333 delicious eggs. He will hide them in (AYA) nature for you to find 🥰. But wait! There is more!! Inside some of the eggs are ‘Golden Tickets’ which are worth beautiful prizes! Come to the AYA Discord Den to find out what you have won! 🤩 https://discord.gg/BrBKcKGdXg 

🍀 ℐ𝓃𝒻𝒾𝓃𝒾𝓉ℯ ℒℴ𝓋ℯ 🍀
🦡 𝒜 𝒻ℯ𝓁𝓁ℴ𝓌 ℬ𝒶𝒹ℊℯ𝓇 🦡
name: AYA nature - Easter Egg hunt
